thread.title: InitLive wins ibtm world 2015 Technology and Innovation Watch Award
thread.title_full: InitLive wins ibtm world 2015 Technology and Innovation Watch Award

author: Assignment Editor
title: InitLive wins ibtm world 2015 Technology and Innovation Watch Award
text:
InitLive wins ibtm world 2015 Technology and Innovation Watch Award Original, timely global, travel, tourism, business news and research: 
Oct 05, 2015 eTN Exclusive: Unique and original, timely, global breaking news: 
InitLive became the winner of this yearâ€™s ibtm world Technology and Innovation Watch Award, for its event mobile app. 
The company presented an innovative cloud-based system that includes a web service and free mobile device app for planning and building schedules for multi-day and multi-venue events. 
The technology also allows meetings and events planners to send out bulk emails, staff to sign up and check in for shifts, provides automatic reminders and updates on schedule changes, recommends replacements for shifts with shortfalls, has a one-tap communication system and filtered broadcasts for targeting specific groups of people.
